title: Smile
description: Smile at 3 strangers today to spread positivity.

title: Qur'an
description: Read at least one page of the Qur'an with reflection.

title: Charity
description: Give a small amount of charity, even if it's just a kind word.

title: Kindness
description: Help a family member with a chore without being asked.

title: Dhikr
description: Keep your tongue moist with the remembrance of Allah while working.

title: Knowledge
description: Learn one new Name of Allah and its meaning.

title: Patience
description: Practice patience in a frustrating situation today.

title: Prayer
description: Pray at least one Sunnah prayer today.

title: Gratitude
description: Write down 3 things you are grateful for today.

title: Environment
description: Pick up litter or plant something small.

title: Family
description: Spend 30 minutes of quality time with a loved one.

title: Health
description: Drink enough water and eat something healthy with Bismillah.

title: Forgiveness
description: Forgive someone who has wronged you in the past.

title: Honesty
description: Be extra mindful of your words and stay truthful all day.

title: Modesty
description: Practice modesty in your actions and speech.

title: Neighbor
description: Check on a neighbor or send them a small gift/food.

title: Silence
description: Avoid arguing or complaining for the entire day.

title: Dua
description: Make a long, sincere Dua for the Ummah after a prayer.

title: Fasting
description: Try to fast a voluntary day (like Monday or Thursday).

title: Cleanliness
description: Clean a part of your house or workspace as an act of worship.

title: Generosity
description: Share your meal or a snack with someone else.

title: Wisdom
description: Read a short story from the lives of the Sahaba.

title: Focus
description: Pray your Salah today with extra focus and calmness.

title: Humility
description: Acknowledge your mistakes and seek forgiveness.

title: Ramadan Spirit
description: Feed a fasting person or prepare a small Iftar for others.

title: Night Prayer
description: Pray two Raka'ahs of Tahajjud before Fajr.

title: Generosity
description: Increase your daily charity during this month.

title: Consistency
description: Maintain a small good habit you started in Ramadan.

title: Joy
description: Bring joy to a child's heart with a small gift or kind word.

title: Reflection
description: Spend 10 minutes in silence reflecting on Allah's creation.

title: Supplication
description: Memorize a new short Dua from the Sunnah.

title: Strength
description: Help someone carry something heavy or assist them physically.

title: Time
description: Use your free time today for something beneficial, not just scrolling.

title: Review
description: Look back at your year and thank Allah for all the blessings.

title: Commitment
description: Make a firm intention for a new spiritual goal for next year.

title: Legacy
description: Teach someone a small piece of beneficial knowledge.
